name: suckfly

procedures: T1003::[Suckfly] used a signed credential-dumping tool to obtain victim account credentials.
T1046::[Suckfly] the victim's internal network for hosts with ports 8080, 5900, and 40 open.
T1059.003::Several tools used by [Suckfly] have been command-line driven.
T1078::[Suckfly] used legitimate account credentials that they dumped to navigate the internal victim network as though they were the legitimate account owner.
T1553.002::[Suckfly] has used stolen certificates to sign its malware.

description: [Suckfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0039) is a China-based threat group that has been active since at least 2014. (Citation: Symantec Suckfly March 2016)
